member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.ClaimTypeMapping
member.summary: Defines the inbound and outbound mapping for claim claim types from jwt to .net claim

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.ClaimTypeMapping.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.ClaimTypeMapping.InboundClaimTypeMap
member.summary: Gets the InboundClaimTypeMap used by JwtSecurityTokenHandler when producing claims from jwt.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.ClaimTypeMapping.OutboundClaimTypeMap
member.summary: Gets the OutboundClaimTypeMap is used by JwtSecurityTokenHandler to shorten claim types when creating a jwt.

member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JsonClaimValueTypes
member.summary: Constants for Json Web tokens.

member.name: F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JsonClaimValueTypes.Json
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonArray
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON array XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonNull
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON null data type
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), we use empty string to represent the claim value and set the ClaimValueType to JsonNull

member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtHeader
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of which contains JSON objects representing the cryptographic operations applied to the JWT and optionally any additional properties of the JWT. The member names within the JWT Header are referred to as Header Parameter Names.
These names MUST be unique and the values must be (s). The corresponding values are referred to as Header Parameter Values.

provides a mapping for the 'alg' value so that values are within the JWT namespace.

member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of which contains JSON objects representing the claims contained in the JWT. Each claim is a JSON object of the form { Name, Value }.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no claims. Default string comparer . Creates a empty

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with . Default string comparer . The claims to add.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with claims added for each parameter specified. Default string comparer .
member.param: If this value is not null, a { iss, 'issuer' } claim will be added.
If this value is not null, a { aud, 'audience' } claim will be added

If this value is not null then for each a { 'Claim.Type', 'Claim.Value' } is added. If duplicate claims are found then a { 'Claim.Type', List<object> } will be created to contain the duplicate values.
If notbefore.HasValue is 'true' a { nbf, 'value' } claim is added.
If expires.HasValue is 'true' a { exp, 'value' } claim is added.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with claims added for each parameter specified. Default string comparer .
member.param: If this value is not null, a { iss, 'issuer' } claim will be added.
If this value is not null, a { aud, 'audience' } claim will be added

If this value is not null then for each a { 'Claim.Type', 'Claim.Value' } is added. If duplicate claims are found then a { 'Claim.Type', List<object> } will be created to contain the duplicate values.
If notbefore.HasValue is 'true' a { nbf, 'value' } claim is added.
If expires.HasValue is 'true' a { exp, 'value' } claim is added.
If issuedAt.HasValue is 'true' a { iat, 'value' } claim is added.
member.remarks:
Comparison is set to
The 4 parameters: 'issuer', 'audience', 'notBefore', 'expires' take precednece over (s) in 'claims'. The values in 'claims' will be overridden.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Actort
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'actor' claim { actort, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'actor' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Acr
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'acr' claim { acr, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'acr' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Amr
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'amr' claim { amr, 'value' } as list of strings.
member.remarks: If the 'amr' claim is not found, an empty enumerable is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.AuthTime
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'auth_time' claim { auth_time, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'auth_time' claim is not found OR could not be converted to , null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Aud
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'audience' claim { aud, 'value' } as a list of strings.
member.remarks: If the 'audience' claim is not found, an empty enumerable is returned.

member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'azp' claim { azp, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'azp' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.CHash
member.summary: Gets 'value' of the 'c_hash' claim { c_hash, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'c_hash' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Exp
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'expiration' claim { exp, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'expiration' claim is not found OR could not be converted to , null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Jti
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'JWT ID' claim { jti, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'JWT ID' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Iat
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'Issued At' claim { iat, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'Issued At' claim is not found OR cannot be converted to null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Iss
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'issuer' claim { iss, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'issuer' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'expiration' claim { nbf, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'notbefore' claim is not found OR could not be converted to , null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Nonce
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'nonce' claim { nonce, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'nonce' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.Sub

member.remarks: If the 'subject' claim is not found, null is returned.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.ValidFrom
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'notbefore' claim { nbf, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'notbefore' claim is not found, then is returned. Time is returned as UTC.

member.name: P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.ValidTo
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'expiration' claim { exp, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'expiration' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.summary: Gets a for each JSON { name, value }.
member.remarks:
Each (s) returned will have the translated according to the mapping found in . Adding and removing to will affect the value of the .
and will be set to the value of ( if null).

member.summary: Adds a JSON object representing the to the

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.AddClaims(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Adds a number of to the as JSON { name, value } pairs.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload.GetDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the DateTime using the number of seconds from 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z (UTC)
member.param: Claim in the payload that should map to an integer.
member.remarks: If the claim is not found, the function returns: DateTime.MinValue
member.exception: If an overflow exception is thrown by the runtime.
member.returns: The DateTime representation of a claim.
